text: How to Steal a Million is a comedy movie of 1966. It is about a high-skilled art forger that fakes being an art collector. His daughter, Nicole, is concerned about his behavior, and more importantly that he might be caught. Audrey Hepburn plays Nicole. This movie was released on July 13, 1966. Category:Criminal comedy movies Category:1966 crime movies Category:1966 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies directed by William Wyler
title: How to Steal a Million
